name: IInterativa
description:
We are Infobase Interativa, or as we like to call, the IInterativa (with two letters "i"). We are the digital unit of Infobase, one of the Top 50 IT integrators in Brazil. By working together, we can deliver solutions that are more sophisticated than other agencies and more creative than IT consultancies.
 
We research, plan, design, build, maintain and grow digital businesses, sites, applications and strategies for customers with very different backgrounds. The results we deliver to our clients guarantee us long-term relationships.
